last_name.description: The last name of the person. Example: 'Müller'. This field is required. Never use placeholders.

first_name.description: The first name of the person. Example: 'Hans'. This field is required. Never use placeholders.

street.description: The street name. This field is required. Write Unknown if unknown.

street_number.description: The street number. This field is required. Write *0* if unknown.

occupation.description: The occupation of the person. Example: 'Bäcker' or 'Lehrer'. This field is required. Never use placeholders.

section.description: The section or group the person belongs to. Use 'Unknown' if not applicable.

honorific.description: Any honorific or title associated with the person. Example: 'Dr.' or 'Prof.'. Use 'Unknown' if not applicable.

additional_notes.description: Any additional notes about the person. Example: Witwe, Waise, etc. Use 'None' if no notes are available.
